items.content_html: ContactFilter is a lightweight web application that allows users to filter a list of contacts by name. Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, it offers a simple and user-friendly interface for quick searches, making contact management effortless and efficient.

Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, it offers a simple and user-friendly interface for quick searches, making contact management effortless and efficient.
